amendment.description: An amendment numbered 63 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds from being used for a proposed new $600 "Asylum Program Fee" on employers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
